entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: ENE 27 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
